      • ensureRacetrackResourcesAreLoaded

        public void ensureRacetrackResourcesAreLoaded(Racetrack racetrack)
        TODO This design is unworthy. Keep out changeable state from ArenaController! And: Polymorphic state is not reflected in ArenaController, which is bad.

        Architectural suggestions:

        • Provide write access to ArenaController (as is now).
        • Keep drawing methods in ArenaController. Move changeable state to callers ('logic layer', e.g. RaceMode)
        • Extract changeable state to new writable 'UI layer' class
        Parameters:
        racetrack -
        See Also:
        resetRacetrackImage()

      • resetRacetrackImage

        public void resetRacetrackImage()
        This method is a workaround of the bad design. Called on reset.
        See Also:
        ensureRacetrackResourcesAreLoaded(Racetrack)
